questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. You'll need to provide your email address, create a password, and fill in your basic information including name and phone number. After registration, you'll receive a verification email to activate your account.

questions.question: I forgot my password, how can I reset it?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your registered email address and we'll send you a password reset link. The link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.

questions.question: Can I change my email address?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your email address in your account settings. Go to 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings' > 'Edit Email'. You'll need to verify the new email address before the change takes effect.

questions.question: How do I delete my account?
questions.answer: To delete your account, go to 'My Account' > 'Account Settings' > 'Delete Account'. Please note that this action is irreversible and will permanently remove all your data, order history, and saved information.

questions.question: How do I place an order?
questions.answer: Browse our products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. You'll need to provide shipping and billing information, select a payment method, and review your order before confirming. You'll receive an order confirmation email once your order is placed.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment gateway.

questions.question: Can I modify or cancel my order?
questions.answer: You can modify or cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it by contacting our customer service. After that, orders are processed and cannot be changed. For cancellations after processing, please refer to our return policy.

questions.question: How do I track my order?
questions.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to 'My Orders', or by using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email. You can also track directly on the carrier's website using the tracking number.

questions.question: What if my order is damaged or incorrect?
questions.answer: If your order arrives damaged or incorrect, please contact us within 48 hours of delivery. Take photos of the damage and we'll arrange for a replacement or refund. You may need to return the damaged items at our expense.

questions.question: How long does shipping take?
questions.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days, express shipping takes 1-2 business days, and overnight shipping is available for select locations. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

questions.question: How much does shipping cost?
questions.answer: Standard shipping is free for orders over $50. For orders under $50, standard shipping costs $5.99. Express shipping costs $12.99, and overnight shipping costs $24.99. International shipping costs vary by location.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Some restrictions may apply to certain products due to local regulations.

questions.question: Can I change my shipping address after ordering?
questions.answer: You can change your shipping address within 1 hour of placing your order by contacting customer service. After that, the order will be processed and shipped to the original address provided.

questions.question: What happens if I'm not home for delivery?
questions.answer: If you're not home, the delivery person will leave a notice with instructions for pickup. You can also authorize delivery to a neighbor or specify a safe location in your delivery instructions.

questions.question: What is your return policy?
questions.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Items must be unused, in original packaging, and in the same condition as received. Some items like electronics, personal care products, and custom items may have different return terms.

questions.question: How do I return an item?
questions.answer: To return an item, go to 'My Orders' in your account, select the order, and click 'Return Item'. Print the return label and package the item securely. Drop it off at any authorized shipping location or schedule a pickup.

questions.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
questions.answer: Once we receive your return, we'll inspect the item and process your refund within 3-5 business days. Refunds are issued to the original payment method and may take 5-10 business days to appear on your statement.

questions.question: Do I have to pay for return shipping?
questions.answer: Return shipping is free for items that are defective, damaged, or incorrect. For other returns, you may be responsible for return shipping costs unless you have a premium membership.

questions.question: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
questions.answer: Yes, you can exchange an item for a different size, color, or model. Exchanges follow the same process as returns. If the new item costs more, you'll pay the difference. If it costs less, you'll receive a refund for the difference.

questions.question: How do I know if a product is in stock?
questions.answer: Product availability is shown on each product page. Items marked as 'In Stock' are ready to ship immediately. Items marked as 'Backordered' will ship when available, and you'll be notified of the expected shipping date.

questions.question: Do you offer product warranties?
questions.answer: Most products come with a manufacturer's warranty. Warranty information is listed on each product page. We also offer extended warranty options for eligible items at checkout.

questions.question: Can I see customer reviews?
questions.answer: Yes, customer reviews and ratings are displayed on each product page. You can filter reviews by rating, date, and helpfulness. We encourage customers to leave honest reviews to help others make informed decisions.

questions.question: Do you offer product recommendations?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide personalized product recommendations based on your browsing and purchase history. You can also find related products and 'Frequently Bought Together' suggestions on product pages.

questions.question: How do I compare products?
questions.answer: You can compare up to 4 products at once using our comparison tool. Add items to your comparison list and click 'Compare' to see side-by-side specifications, features, and pricing.

questions.question: How can I contact customer service?
questions.answer: You can contact us through live chat (available 24/7), email at support@ecomstore.com, or phone at 1-800-ECOMMERCE (available Monday-Friday, 8 AM-8 PM EST). We typically respond within 2 hours.

questions.question: What are your customer service hours?
questions.answer: Our live chat is available 24/7. Phone support is available Monday-Friday, 8 AM-8 PM EST, and Saturday-Sunday, 9 AM-6 PM EST. Email support is monitored daily and we respond within 2 hours during business hours.

questions.question: Do you offer technical support?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer technical support for products we sell. Technical support is available through our customer service channels. For complex issues, we may connect you with the manufacturer's support team.

questions.question: Can I speak to a supervisor?
questions.answer: If our customer service representatives cannot resolve your issue, you can request to speak with a supervisor. Supervisors are available during business hours and will contact you within 24 hours.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard SSL encryption to protect your payment information. We never store your complete credit card details on our servers. All transactions are processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways.

questions.question: How do you protect my personal information?
questions.answer: We protect your personal information through encryption, secure servers, and strict access controls. We never sell your personal information to third parties. For more details, please read our Privacy Policy.

questions.question: What if I notice unauthorized charges?
questions.answer: If you notice unauthorized charges, contact us immediately and we'll investigate. We also recommend contacting your bank or credit card company to report the issue. We have fraud protection measures in place to prevent unauthorized transactions.

questions.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
questions.answer: Yes, we have a rewards program where you earn points for every purchase. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders. You can also earn bonus points for reviews, referrals, and special promotions.

questions.question: How do I earn reward points?
questions.answer: You earn 1 point for every $1 spent on eligible purchases. You can also earn bonus points for writing product reviews (50 points), referring friends (100 points), and participating in special promotions.

questions.question: How do I redeem my reward points?
questions.answer: You can redeem points at checkout. 100 points = $1 discount. Points can be used on most items, though some restrictions may apply. Points expire after 2 years if not used.

questions.question: The website is not loading properly
questions.answer: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or try a different browser. If the issue persists, check your internet connection or try accessing the site from a different device. Contact us if the problem continues.

questions.question: I can't add items to my cart
questions.answer: This could be due to browser issues or the item being out of stock. Try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or using a different browser. If the problem continues, contact our customer service.

questions.question: My order confirmation email didn't arrive
questions.answer: Check your spam or junk folder first. If you don't see it there, contact our customer service with your order number and we can resend the confirmation email or provide order details.
